text: aur (ai rasool) tumhaara paravaradigaar phasaadiyon ko khoob jaanata hai aur agar vah tumhe jhuthalae to tum kah do ki hamaare lie hamaaree kaar gujaaree hai aur tumhaare lie tumhaaree kaarastaanee jo kuchh mai karata hoon usake tum zimmedaar nahin aur jo kuchh tum karate ho usase mai baree hoon
